name: unstoppably
content:
Add to word list

in a way that cannot be stopped or prevented from developing: Suddenly it was easy to imagine the stock market crashing unstoppably downwards. She remains unstoppably energetic and combative, and reluctant to live in the past.
More examplesFewer examplesTemperamental opposites, they were drifting, seemingly unstoppably, apart.The world watched powerlessly as the invading army moved unstoppably towards the capital.The dogs barked continuously and unstoppably all afternoon.They rejected the idea that history is moving unstoppably in a certain direction.
